item.title: T-Mobile 下注 "超级移动 "计划吸引企业客户
item.description: 美国无线网络供应商 T-Mobile 周三发布了新的 "SuperMobile "计划，该计划提供卫星连接并将延迟降到最低，以增加企业客户。【原文：U.S. wireless network provider T-Mobile on Wednesday unveiled its new "SuperMobile" plan, which offers satellite connectivity and minimized latency, as it looks to add enterprise clients.】

item.title: Sompo 控股公司将以 35 亿美元收购 Aspen 保险公司
item.description: 日本 Sompo 控股公司周三表示，该公司将以约 35 亿美元的价格收购在纽约上市的 Aspen 保险控股公司，这是日本金融公司最近一次大手笔的海外收购。【原文：Japan's Sompo Holdings said on Wednesday that it will acquire New York-listed Aspen Insurance Holdings for around $3.5 billion, in the latest big ticket overseas acquisition by a Japanese financial firm.】

item.title: 据 SZ 报道，德国银行因欺诈问题停止了 100 亿欧元的 PayPal 支付业务
item.description: 据《Sueddeutsche Zeitung 报》周三报道，由于担心欺诈问题，德国银行阻止了价值超过 100 亿欧元（约合 117 亿美元）的 PayPal 支付。【原文：German banks blocked PayPal payments worth more than 10 billion euros ($11.7 billion) due to concerns about fraud, the Sueddeutsche Zeitung newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 莫斯科法院以未遵守俄罗斯法律为由对 Pinterest 和 Twitch 处以罚款
item.description: 俄罗斯一家法院周三在其 Telegram 频道上表示，已对社交网站 Pinterest 和 Twitch 分别处以违反当地互联网法规的罚款。【原文：A Russian court has fined social networking sites Pinterest and Twitch in separate cases for violating local internet regulations, the court said on Wednesday on its Telegram channel.】

item.title: 美国财政部长贝森特：美国无意入股英伟达
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，美国 "不会 "入股芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）。【原文：A U.S. stake in chipmaker Nvidia is "not on the table" Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼敦促 TikTok 和 Meta 针对有害网络内容采取行动
item.description: 印度尼西亚一名政府官员周三表示，由于虚假信息在网上传播，印尼已传唤 Meta Platforms Inc、ByteDance 的 TikTok 和其他社交媒体平台的代表，命令他们加强内容审核。【原文：Indonesia has summoned representatives of Meta Platforms Inc , ByteDance's TikTok and other social media platforms, ordering them to boost content moderation as disinformation has spread online, a government official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 计划耗资 50 亿美元扩建西班牙数据中心项目
item.description: 美国资产管理公司 Blackstone 正寻求扩大其在西班牙阿拉贡建设数据中心的计划项目，将向该地区追加 43 亿欧元（50.3 亿美元）的投资，力争使其成为主要的云计算中心。【原文：U.S. asset manager Blackstone is looking to expand its planned project to build data centres in Spain's Aragon, with an additional investment of 4.3 billion euros ($5.03 billion) in the region striving to become a major cloud computing hub.】

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch上调年度销售预期
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周三上调了年度销售预期，看好其 Hollister 品牌连衣裙和牛仔裤的强劲需求，因为购物者会优先考虑时尚服饰的消费，而不会受到价格上涨的影响。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch raised its annual sales forecast on Wednesday, betting on robust demand for its Hollister brand of dresses and jeans as shoppers prioritize spending on trendy apparel undeterred by price hikes.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：中国旨在将人工智能芯片产量提高两倍，减少对英伟达的依赖
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，中国的芯片制造商正寻求在2026年将中国的人工智能芯片产量提高两倍，以减少对英伟达（Nvidia）的依赖。【原文：China's chipmakers are seeking to triple the country's output of artificial intelligence chips in 2026, rushing to reduce dependence on Nvidia , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 科尔百货上调年度利润目标，扭亏为盈成效显著
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周三上调了年度利润预期，原因是这家美国连锁百货公司在扭亏为盈的同时控制了成本，并努力在关键的假日购物季挽回顾客，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 15%。【原文：Kohl's raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday as the U.S. department store chain's turnaround reins in costs amid efforts to bring back customers during the key holiday shopping season, sending its shares up 15% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，纽蒙特公司计划裁员以降低成本
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，黄金矿商纽蒙特公司（Newmont）正计划裁员，以全面削减成本。【原文：Gold miner Newmont is planning to cut jobs in a sweeping cost-cutting drive, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者担心特朗普的英特尔协议开启美国工业政策时代
item.description: 美国政府新入股英特尔公司让一些投资者感到紧张，他们担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的交易预示着一个政府插手私营企业的时代的到来，尤其是在特朗普要求这家计算机芯片制造商的首席执行官辞职之后做出的这一安排。【原文：The U.S. government's new stake in Intel is making some investors nervous that President Donald Trump's deal heralds an era of government meddling in private industry, particularly as the arrangement followed Trump's call for the resignation of the computer chip maker's CEO.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国空头收益率下滑，英伟达备受关注
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 英伟达业绩倒计时，华尔街期货收平
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货持平，因为投资者在等待人工智能领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）发布财报，这将考验华尔街以科技为主导的大盘涨势。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat on Wednesday, as investors stepped aside in anticipation of AI leader Nvidia's earnings release that will test Wall Street's broader technology-led rally.】

item.title: Jeff Hildebrand 的 Harvest Midstream 将以 10 亿美元收购 MPLX 的部分管道资产
item.description: 由私人控股公司 Hilcorp Energy 创始人拥有的 Harvest Midstream 公司已同意从 MPLX 公司收购价值 10 亿美元的天然气收集和加工资产，两家公司于周三表示。【原文：Harvest Midstream, owned by the founder of privately held Hilcorp Energy, has agreed a deal to acquire $1 billion worth of natural gas gathering and processing assets from MPLX , the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Anthropic 挫败了黑客滥用克劳德人工智能进行网络犯罪的企图
item.description: Anthropic 公司周三表示，它已经发现并阻止了企图滥用其克劳德人工智能系统编写钓鱼邮件、创建恶意代码和规避安全过滤器的黑客。【原文：Anthropic said on Wednesday it had detected and blocked hackers attempting to misuse its Claude AI system to write phishing emails, create malicious code and circumvent safety filters.】

item.title: 英伟达财报：人工智能需求、中国以及其他值得关注的问题
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）是自 2023 年以来 S&P 500 指数上涨背后的主导力量，该公司将在美国股市收盘后公布第二季度财报。华尔街屏住呼吸，将在该公司的评论中寻找业绩放缓的迹象。【原文：AI chipmaker Nvidia, the dominating force behind the rally in the S&P 500 index since 2023, is set to report second-quarter earnings after U.S. market close. Wall Street is holding its breath, and will scour the company's commentary for signs of a slowdown.】

item.title: 英伟达发布财报，人工智能行业面临考验
item.description: 本周三，风向标英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）将公布第二季度财报，过去几年推动市场发展的人工智能主题将面临关键时刻。【原文：The artificial intelligence theme that has propelled markets over the past couple years faces a crucial moment on Wednesday, when bellwether Nvidia Corp reports its second-quarter results.】

item.title: 消耗殆尽的银行气候联盟将就结构性变化进行表决
item.description: 银行业领导全球碳减排工作的主要组织周三表示，在许多最大的成员高调退出后，该组织计划对其结构进行全面改革。【原文：The banking industry's main group leading the sector's global effort to cut carbon emissions plans to overhaul its structure, it said on Wednesday, after the high-profile exit of many of its largest members.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：欧盟考虑本周取消美国关税
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出要求，在美国降低对欧盟汽车出口的关税之前，欧盟将加快立法，在本周末之前取消对美国工业产品的所有关税。【原文：The European Union is aiming to expedite legislation to remove all tariffs on U.S. industrial goods by the end of the week, a demand made by President Donald Trump before the U.S. will lower its duties on the bloc's automobile exports, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国工商总会称，德国企业希望欧盟在美国关税谈判中采取强硬行动
item.description: 一项呼吁布鲁塞尔采取更强硬行动的德国企业民意调查显示，由于缺乏明确性，美国和欧盟之间的关税协议只会成为企业的负担。【原文：The agreement between the United States and European Union on tariffs serves only as a burden to companies due to its lack of clarity, according to a poll of German businesses calling for tougher action from Brussels.】

item.title: WiWo 报道，洛克希德-马丁公司寻求由德国莱茵金属公司生产导弹
item.description: 经济周刊》（WirtschaftsWoche）援引洛克希德马丁公司欧洲负责人的话称，美国国防承包商洛克希德马丁公司正在寻求让德国同行莱茵金属公司在德国生产包括 ATACMS 和地狱火类型在内的导弹。【原文：U.S. defence contractor Lockheed Martin is seeking to have German peer Rheinmetall manufacture missiles including ATACMS and Hellfire types in Germany, magazine WirtschaftsWoche cited Lockheed's head of Europe as saying.】

item.title: 中国顶级餐饮外卖公司美团营收不及预期
item.description: 中国领先的餐饮外卖集团美团周三公布，由于面临 "即时零售 "领域日益激烈的竞争，其第二季度营收增长11.6%，低于预期。【原文：China's leading food delivery group Meituan , on Wednesday reported a 11.6% rise in second-quarter revenue missing expectations as it faces increasing competition in the "instant retail" sector.】

item.title: 日本在 8 月报告中对关税对经济的影响保持谨慎态度
item.description: 日本政府在周三发布的月度报告中重申了对美国贸易政策给经济增长带来风险的担忧，并下调了对企业利润的评级。【原文：The Japanese government reiterated concerns about the risks of U.S. trade policies to economic growth, prompting a downgrade of its view on corporate profits, in a monthly report released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国股市创十年新高，吸引犹豫不决的散户投资者
item.description: 在国家支持的机构和大型投资者的支持下，中国股市创下了十年来的新高，而散户资金也在缓慢地重返股市，为股市带来了新的动力。【原文：Chinese stocks are at decade highs after a rally powered by support from state-backed institutions and bigger investors, with retail money slowly making their way back into shares providing a fresh tail wind.】

item.title: 中国储蓄者是股市繁荣的下一个催化剂
item.description: 在国家资金和大型机构的支持下，中国股市一路高歌猛进，分析人士称，散户投资者的亢奋情绪并不明显，这表明即使在经济复苏步履维艰的情况下，中国股市的涨势依然强劲。【原文：China's stock market is on a tear supported by state money and big institutions, and analysts say the absence of retail investor euphoria suggests the rally has legs even as the economic recovery struggles to gather pace.】

item.title: RWE 首席执行官认为无需减记美国大型近海项目的费用
item.description: 就在美国政府下令更大的竞争对手 Orsted 停止在一个先进地点的建设之后几天，全球第二大海上风能开发商 RWE 首席执行官表示，该公司认为没有必要减记在美国的一个 3 千兆瓦项目。【原文：RWE, the world's No. 2 developer of offshore wind, sees no need to write down a 3-gigawatt project in the United States, its CEO said, just days after the U.S. government ordered bigger rival Orsted to stop construction on an advanced site.】

item.title: 亚马逊计划在越南部署 Kuiper 卫星服务
item.description: 越南科技部在一份声明中表示，亚马逊的目标是在越南部署 Kuiper 卫星服务。【原文：Amazon is aiming to deploy Kuiper satellite services in Vietnam, Vietnam's Ministry of Science and Technology said in a statement.】

item.title: 瑞安航空欢迎波音公司快速交付飞机
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周三表示，波音公司已经提前了向廉价航空公司瑞安交付飞机的计划，预计到 10 月份将交付 25 架新飞机，而不是明年春季。【原文：Boeing has bumped up its delivery schedule to budget carrier Ryanair , with 25 new aircraft expected to be delivered by October instead of the spring of next year, the airline's CEO Michael O'Leary said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，福特将因仪表板问题召回超过 35.5 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，福特汽车公司因仪表板显示屏问题在美国召回超过 35.5 万辆汽车。【原文：Ford Motor Company is recalling more than 355,000 vehicles in the U.S over a issue with the instrument panel display, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】
